    • readRecordString

      public OPair<String,Map<String,ORidSet>> readRecordString(int maxRidbagSizeLazyImport) throws IOException, ParseException
      Parameters:
      maxRidbagSizeLazyImport -
      Returns:
      a pair containing as a key the parsed record string (with big ridbags emptied), and as a value the map of big ridbag field names and content
      Throws:
      IOException
      ParseException
